screech.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to shout loudly in an unpleasant high voice because you are angry, afraid, or excited
screech.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She screeched at me to take off my muddy shoes.
screech.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a vehicle screeches, its wheels make a high unpleasant noise as it moves along or stops
screech.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: A van screeched onto the road in front of me.
The car screeched to a halt.
